name: Baldi weird basics + randomized mod
description:
Baldi weird basics + randomized mod is a mod where the game is weird and randomized

Mod have been released!

What's feature in this mod?
  • The game is randomized
  • The item is randomized
  • Some audios is weird
  • Some textures is weird
  • Items can respawn

Enjoy the mod!

for Baldi's Basics Official VN: Please port it to android. Because when i port it, some audio is not edited (i used UnityEX).
